text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: I wonder if Maya's reached the<n>chapel by now?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure Air Groove, Dober,<n>Kawakami, and everyone else
will<n>pass the audition.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
...Yeah! It'll be super buono to be able<n>to see everyone in
their dresses!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
You know, when I was younger, I<n>wanted to be that biiig hot
pot they<n>always make for sumo<n>wrestlers—chanko.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Eating delicious food makes people<n>happy, and I really liked
the thought of<n>seeing everyone full of joy.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Plus, eating chanko makes you big<n>and strong! And what's
more buono<n>than being strong and happy? ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Awww, that's so like you, Bono. ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Wait... Then why did you decide to<n>enter Tracen Academy?
Does it have<n>something to do with hot pot?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Not at all. I gave up on my chankodream. I mean, if I'm the hot pot, Iwouldn't get to have any myself!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
As long as I'm buono and everyone<n>else is buono, then it's
all good!<n>That's why I came here. ♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Don't you think races are kinda like<n>chanko? They both put
smiles on<n>people's faces and help you grow<n>stronger
along with your friends. ♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: It's okay... I'm fine. Everything's<n>buono, buono!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: No, it's not!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Maya! What are you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
You have to hurry back! You won't be<n>able to finish in first
place if you don't!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: No! I've made up my mind! We'regoing to get to the chapel together!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Don't you remember how you said<n>it'd be buono if we all
got our own<n>dresses?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: If you don't pass this audition, it<n>won't be buono at all!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: A-are you sure? Is it... really okay for<n>me to keep trying?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Of course!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Are you okay? Should we rest for a<n>bit?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: No, it's fine. I don't want to be a<n>burden on you.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Don't say that! It's not good to push<n>yourself!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Let's take a break when we reach<n>that river over there. You
copy?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Urgh... Copy that...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Maya... I'm sorry for causing so<n>much trouble for you.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
If we don't reach the goal quickly,<n>we'll lose the chance to
wear Ms.<n>Beauty's racewear, yet here I am,<n>dragging us
both down...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Heeey, stop that! You haven't caused<n>me any trouble!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I mean, I do want that racewear. A<n>grown-up outfit like that
would really<n>make me shine.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But if I abandoned you here, I<n>wouldn't be fit to wear a
such a<n>twinkly outfit!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I view being a mature, sophisticated<n>woman the same way
you see races!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It's not enough if I'm the only one<n>happy—I want everyone
to be happy<n>and twinkle like the sun!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Maya...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
(The truth is, I was so upset... I really<n>didn't want to retire
from the race.)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
(I wanted to compete in the audition,<n>become a muse, and
race in a<n>wedding dress with everyone else.)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Maya.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: You're welcome! Let's become<n>muses together, Bono!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Neither of them have arrived yet.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
We should probably send out a<n>search and rescue team
soon...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Buono, buono!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Buono, buono! ☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, we made it! ♪ The main<n>character always arrives
last!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
What are you talking about? Do you<n>have any idea how
worried we were?!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Beauty is waiting for you in the<n>chapel. Go on and tell
her your true<n>feelings!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Oookay! ♪ Ready, Maya?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ready! Let's take off towards<n>Beauty! ☆
